title: HELP! What is this font?
content:
HI NEW USER HERE @ TYPOPHILE!

I’m sorry to be very urgent but I don’t know what this font is and it’s killing me!

[http://www.imagebam.com/image/2956f34106352](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906160809/http:/www.imagebam.com/image/2956f34106352)

[http://www.imagebam.com/image/bfeea54106353](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906160809/http:/www.imagebam.com/image/bfeea54106353)

It’s from THE TWILIGHT ZONE, but it’s not TWYLITE-BOOK.

If the links don’t work I attached some files as well;)

Look forward to anyone’s help, THANK YOU!

author: FranklinDemi
